Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 82nd overall pick, by Minnesota in 1971...
Injured on 4/17/1971 with a Fractured Nose, out for 6 days...
Traded from Minnesota to Troy on 6/6/1973 (Going to TRO: P R. Satterwhite, P J. Brace, P J. Desalvo. Going to Min: RF R. Hart)...
Injured on 7/27/1974 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Troy to Wisconsin on 1/31/1975 (Going to TRO: 2B O. Erhart. Going to WIS: P J. Brace, P R. Barnett)...
Injured on 7/25/1975 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 6/11/1976...
Had first career hit on 4/25/1978, off Brett Manwaring (NJ)...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/2/1982 to a 3-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
